body: Better yet, husband decides to surprise family and come home early, sees all the shoes and noises from  the bedroom. Sees what is going on, wife and daughter shocked, as well as the tutor and the others. Husband leaves the room and they think he is sad. Nope, he went to the study and get his gun to shoot all the guys fro raping his family. Wife and daughter are scared to go along with story for police. THE END.

Another family ruined, maybe to the point the daughter fails her exams. Hoping either the husband comes home and the asshole leaves a memory card for him to find and divorce happens, or he  goes on a murder spree.
Both of them got fucked by the tutor were kinda hot.
Dumb blackmail plot again. Maybe it's a cultural thing but how is it threatening to have a sex tape of a married couple? So dumb...
So he stole her and her husbands sex tape and thats supposed to make her scared why?
These kind of series are making really hate these kind of guys who rarely open their eyes.
